meanings.definition: To bring down to a lower position.
meanings.sent1: She lowes the book onto the table gently.
meanings.sent2: He slowly lowes himself onto the chair.
meanings.sent3: The cat lowes the toy mouse off the shelf playfully.
meanings.sent4: The wind lowes the leaves to the ground with a gentle touch.
meanings.sent5: The teacher lowes the map for the students to see clearly.

meanings.sent1: Among the hills, that one is the lowes.
meanings.sent2: Her score was the lowes in the class.
meanings.sent3: The smallest flower in the garden is the lowes of them all.
meanings.sent4: In the race, he finished at the lowes position.
meanings.sent5: The temperature today is the lowes it has been all week.

meanings.definition: A store chain specializing in home improvement products.
meanings.sent1: We went to Lowes to buy paint for the living room.
meanings.sent2: Lowes is known for its wide selection of tools and materials.
meanings.sent3: I got lost in Lowes trying to find the light bulbs aisle.
meanings.sent4: At Lowes, you can find everything you need for your DIY projects.
meanings.sent5: Lowes is a popular choice for homeowners looking to renovate their kitchens.
